title: flashgordon69
author: flashgordon69
content: I am looking to rent betting exchange accounts. Primarily BETFAIR. Only interested in UK/Ireland accounts where gambling is tax free so you will have no tax implications on the winnings. You will also need a Skrill account + a crypto account. You get to keep your accounts when we are done and they will be in good standing. While i am using your account you will not be able to gamble on it unless you clear it with me first. For using your account you get to keep 10% of the profits if there are profits. After 3 months if we have a good relationship and things are working well i will up that to 20%. After a year we can review the terms and increase your share even more. When we withdraw the winnings you will send me my share via crypto. Since this is gambling i cannot guarantee profits but i will cover the costs of the account and i have a good track record. Message me on telegram if you are interested in talking further. https://t.me/flashgordon69

comments.author: flashgordon69
comments.body: Also if you just want to sell your account then message me.

comments.author: marbet85
comments.body: Check my TOPIC, I can sell you Betfair with Skrill / Neteller.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5358066.msg60922523#msg60922523tg: babelos
